will not gain your proficiency bonus when attacking if you aren't proficient with said weapon. You won't be penalized for using a weapon you are not proficient with, but the likelihood of hitting an enemy is reduced because you don't get the added benefit of proficiency.

Every characters Weapon proficiency is determined by their Race and Classes, some of those weapons also benefit specific Races. For example, Elves gain proficiency with Longswords, Shortswords, shortbows and longbows. Wizards
